properties.areaDesc: New Madrid, MO; Pemiscot, MO; Lake, TN
properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 2 at 12:31PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood
Advisory for the Mississippi River...

Mississippi River at Tiptonville affecting New Madrid...Pemiscot
and Lake Counties

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
the Mississippi River at Tiptonville
* from Saturday, January 4, until further notice.
* At 12 PM Thursday the stage was 30.1 feet.
* Flood stage is 37.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will continue to rise through the weekend,
with a flat crest near 35.1 feet early next week.
* At 35.0 feet...In Tennessee, a large section of Lake County
Tennessee Road 79 is flooded near the levee. Most fields and
pastures south of Stewart, Missouri are covered by flood water.
properties.instruction:
The next River Statement will be issued this evening or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
